name: Accept Bitcoin instantly via OpenNode
author: OpenNode

sections.installation:
1. Install the WooCommerce OpenNode plugin:
    • Install through WordPress Plugin Manager: Admin » Plugins » Add New » Enter “opennode woocommerce” in search » Click “Install Now”
    • Upload ZIP: Admin » Plugins » Add New » Upload Plugin
    • Extract ZIP and upload extracted directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ through FTP
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter API Credentials to WooCommerce-OpenNode Plugin Settings: Admin » WooCommerce » Click on Checkout tab » Find “OpenNode” in Payment Gateways table » Click “Settings”
  4. Check “Enable Cryptocurrency payments via OpenNode” checkbox.
sections.description:
Start accepting Bitcoin instantly through Lightning Network today. Powered by OpenNode

OpenNode for WooCommerce

This plugin allows stores that use WordPress WooCommerce shopping cart system to accept Bitcoin and Bitcoin through Lightning Network via OpenNode.

Features

  • Payment amount is calculated using real-time exchange rates.
  • Allows for fee-less and instant Bitcoin payments through Lightning Network.
  • Supports traditional on-chain transactions using the new native SegWit addresses (bech32)
  • No setup or recurring fees.
  • Free Lightning Network and scheduled withdrawals.

In order to use this plugin you have to create an account on https://opennode.com
